item.title: A tech analyst listed his favorite internet stocks for 2026. Here's what he picked
item.description: Mark Mahaney, head of the firm's internet research team, shared his top picks in both the large and small/mid-cap spaces.

item.title: Tuesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages slid on Monday, with the S&P 500 posting back-to-back losses as investors sold tech names heading into the end of 2025.

item.title: Retail investors have been shying away from 60/40 funds, says JPMorgan. What they're doing instead
item.description: Mom and pop investors seem to be turning away from multi-asset funds and opting for a do-it-yourself approach.

item.title: Here's what investor Joe Terranova is selling before year-end
item.description: Joe Terranova said that he sold out of his position in gold following a dramatic overnight reversal in precious metals.

item.title: Nvidia quietly bought a competitor last week. Why analysts believe this could be big deal for the stock
item.description: Nvidia's $20 billion deal to buy Groq will help it compete with Google as its rival continues marketing its TPUs for large-scale AI projects, analysts...
